title: Secondary Diagonal Reflection Task
description: Reflect the grid across the secondary diagonal (top-right to bottom-left)
hints: Imagine a line going from the top-right corner to the bottom-left corner of the grid ↙️. Flip the grid over this line.
The top-left corner will swap with the bottom-right corner, like a different kind of mirror.
Think of this as "flipping the grid upside down" and then "flipping it left to right" all at once.
